ModMetaData.name: ED-ReinforcedStuff
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description: Adds a Reinforced version of some Stuff. This allows for stronger constructions. Aproximatly 10x strengeth, 5x build time. Reinforced Stuff takes 10 of the non Resources Stuff to make in a Molecular Reinforcment Compressor. Currently Reinforced Stuff can be made from Steel, Plasteel, Wood and Stone.
